attributes.action: why the bbc only pay for the england football games and none of the other uk teams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think the bbc should pay for all national. football games that involve scotland, wales and northern ireland. not just the england games.

 please help make a difference
